title: Episode 747 - Special Guest Paul Virzi
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by comedian Paul Verzi to talk about his new podcast with Bill Burr called ‘Anything Better’, his deleted scenes from ‘The King of Staten Island’, the state of comedy and content publishing in the wake of the Ca...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by comedian Paul Verzi to talk about his new podcast with Bill Burr called ‘Anything Better’, his deleted scenes from ‘The King of Staten Island’, the state of comedy and content publishing in the wake of the Capitol Building riots, the importance of authenticity in anything creative you do, and Ross’s bender in Miami in preparation for the College Football Playoff Championship Game.
